entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect IL2059 for `RunClassConstructor` on any `System.Nullable<T>` instantiation #106939
  • [QUIC] Issue with `AcceptInboundStreamAsync()` Hanging and Failing to Accept Inbound Streams #106938
  • How to use proxy on Windows and Linux when PAC file is used #106933
  • `SortedSet<T>.SortedSetEquals` is not correct when the sets have different comparers #106932
  • [API Proposal]: Option validation features for `IServiceCollection` #106931
    Future

Closed

  • ConfigurationBinder.Get binds empty IDictionary<string, string> as null #106820
    Future
  • Disallow nonexistent DateTime creation #106821
  • Port System.Net docs for .NET 9 APIs #106789
    9.0.0
  • NET9 System.TimeSpan.FromSeconds(5) does not compile any more in mixed mode c++ cli with .NET9 preview 7 and VS 2022 17.12 preview due to ambigous type (either long long or double but not int directly) #106935
    9.0.0
  • 3x perf regression on 13th Gen Intel Core (i7-13800H) maybe in readonly struct passed by ref #106679
    9.0.0
  • Consider updating to macosx-version-min=10.14 #48721
    Future
  • Rework how we determine if we can do a managed build or not #5967
    Future
  • For .NET Core 2.1, the CoreCLR symbols are missing for IL symbols. #33550
    Future
  • Make AzDO builds use artifacts dir laid out the same as local build's artifacts dir #1030
    Future
  • Share yml templates between runtimes #2029
    Future
  • Collapse jobs in official builds #45396
    Future
  • Enable AddressSanitizer on Debug and Checked builds for both MSVC and Clang #52131
    Future
  • Failure to restore 2.1.808 SDK dependency #48443
    Future
  • Ensure we are building against LTTng with latest fixes #63407
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] JIT: emit vzeroupper before calls to the bulk write barrier helper #106937
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize write barriers for server gc on arm64 #106934
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix logging formatting #106367
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.10
  • JIT: emit vzeroupper before calls to the bulk write barrier helper #106908
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "[LoongArch64] Add proj to generate nupkg runtime.linux-loongarch64.runtime.native.System.IO.Ports" #106882
    area-System.IO, arch-loongarch64

Updated

  • Generic Enumerable.Range method #106925
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2523809 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Set GC metrics to zero prior to first GC #106734
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Add lld in dependency script #106913
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    NO-MERGE, area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Use TestExclusionList in bringup_runtest.sh #106201
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • error MSB3030: (NETCORE_ENGINEERING_TELEMETRY=Build) Could not copy the file #42964
  • error MSB3231: Unable to remove directory #42963
  • Track signature errors #42870
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • could't run dotnet sdk using proot #26650
  • SDK 8.0.401: `dotnet workload install wasm-tools ` does not install correctly #42919

PullRequests

Created

  • Use Defender on Linux in VMR pipeline #42996
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Go To Definition stops working #74756
  • Design-time race condition with MyProject.GeneratedMSBuildEditorConfig.editorconfig #51768
    Backlog
  • CSharpScript.EvaluateAsync() growing memory usage #31751
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify and unify assembly loader provider #74895
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Updated

  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, Needs API Review, VSCode, Backlog
  • Add explicit cast to UseCoalesceExpressionForIfNullStatementCheckCodeFixProvider #74471
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update field keyword feature name and details #74671
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix null encoding in new document in move type action #74623
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix leading comments not being preserved on variable case #74278
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Optimize single spread collection expression for `List<T>` #74769
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process #74780
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support exclusion of Razor Page code behind classes from code coverage #57511
  • Blazor Server - Input element is not re-rendered. #57510
  • Consistent naming of settings files #57509
  • Option to use static ports in launchSettings.json #57508
  • Set `launchBrowser` to `false` by default, in launchSettings.json #57507
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, single_query #57506

Closed

  • Performance degradation for a loop while running in docker container #57485
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #57503
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_dapper, updates #57421
  • Perf regression: endpoint #57468
  • Perf regression: json #57502
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json_middleware #57497

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AppThemeBinding BarBackground with Brush in NavigationPage not working #24428
  • Receiving text sent to the MAUI app using Share function on Android does not work #24423
    Backlog
  • No se encuentra la tarea "maui: Build". #24419

Closed

  • Bug report page shows a broken link to Xamarin.Forms repo. #24424
  • App crash in Release Mode when binding ItemSource in CollectionView #24416

PullRequests

Created

  • BarBackground with Brush in NavigationPage on theme change #24429
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, partner/android
  • Remove excessive Application API docs #24427
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • BarBackground with Brush in TabbedPage on theme change #24425
    community ✨

Merged

  • Remove Xamarin.Forms repo link in issue template #24426
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

Updated

  • [net9.0] Fix loop CarouselViewHandler2 #24230
    9.0-rc1
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • [Android] Map FlowDirection of shell to PlatformView on Android #23473
    community ✨
  • Fix for FlexLayout padding issue #24195
    community ✨
  • Fix shadow consistency on Android and iOS #24415
    community ✨
  • Fix navigation stuck on iOS when pushing on hidden tab section in TabBar #22574
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix border lagging and unwanted animations on iOS #24360
    community ✨
